item.title: BL-76/US-6 East at CO-14
item.description: BL-76/US-6 East at CO-14 in Sterling. Turn left for CO-14 West; right for BL-76/US-6/CO-14 East To US-138/To I-76.

item.title: BL-76/US-6 West at CO-14 and US-138
item.description: BL-76/US-6 West at CO-14 and US-138 in Sterling. Turn right for US-138 East to Julesburg. Continue straight for BL-76/US-6/CO-14 East to Brush. Both CO-14 and US-138 begin at this intersection.

item.title: BL-76/US-6 West - To US-138/CO-14
item.description: BL-76/US-6 West - To US-138/CO-14 in Sterling.

item.title: BL-76/US-6 West - Sterling
item.description: (BL-76)/US-6 West/To US-138/To CO-14 in Sterling

item.title: US-138 East at US-385
item.description: US-138 East at US-385 in Sedgwick County. Turn left for US-385 North; continue straight for US-385 South/US-138 East. US-385 joins US-138 through Julesburg.

item.title: US-138 East Approaching US-385
item.description: US-138 East approaching US-385 junction. Turn left for US-385 north to Chappell and Sidney (both destinations in Nebraska). Continue on US-138 East/US-385 South for Julesburg and Holyoke.

item.title: US-138 East - Distance Marker and Scenic Byway
item.description: Distance marker on US-138 east. Distance to Julesburg and Big Springs (NE). US-138 is part of the South Platte River Trail Scenic Byway.

item.title: US-138 West Offramp at US-385 South
item.description: US-138 West Offramp at US-385 South in Julesburg. Turn left for US-385 south to Holyoke.

item.title: US-138 West at US-385
item.description: US-138 West at US-385 interchange. Exit for US-385 south to Holyoke. Continue straight for US-385 North/US-138 West.

item.title: US-138 West Approaching US-385
item.description: US-138 West approaching US-385 in Julesburg. Use US-385 South for Holyoke. US-385 North joins US-138 West through Julesburg.

item.title: US-138 West - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-138 west. Distance to Julesburg and Sterling.

item.title: US-138 West - Entering Colorado
item.description: Welcome to Colorful Colorado - Sedgwick County on US-138 west. The electronic message board reads “Face Masks Required” (this being the COVID-19 summer of 2020).

item.title: US-138 West (Signed as NE-138)
item.description: US-138 West shield incorrectly signed as NE-138.

item.title: US-138 West at I-80 East (Exit 101)
item.description: US-138 West at I-80 East (Exit 101) to North Platte.

item.title: US-138 West/I-76 Alternate West
item.description: US-138 West/I-76 Alternate West passing under I-80 (Exit 101) overpass. Use US-138 west as I-76 alternate.

item.title: US-138 West at I-80 West (Exit 101)
item.description: US-138 West at I-80 West (Exit 101) to Sidney. Continue west on US-138 for Julesburg (CO).

item.title: US-138 West Approaching I-80 (Exit 101)
item.description: US-138 West Approaching I-80 (Exit 101) in Deuel County.

item.title: US-138 West - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-138 west. Distance to Julesburg and Denver (both in Colorado).

item.title: End NE-25B Link North at US-138
item.description: End NE-25B Link North at US-138 in Big Springs. Continue straight for US-138 East to US-30; turn left for US-138 West.

item.title: I-80 East - Exit 101
item.description: I-80 east approaching Exit 101 - US-138/Big Springs/Julesburg (Colorado).

item.title: I-80 East - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on I-80 east. Distance to US-138 Exit and North Platte.
